amendment.description: To provide an additional $500,000,000 for economic development in Afghanistan.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3672 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 3672 proposed by Senator Dayton. (consideration: S9585-9586; text: CR S9585) To provide an additional $500,000,000 for economic development in Afghanistan.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3672 proposed by Senator Dayton.
